# pypitester

A simple Python package for testing PyPI publishing.

## Installation

```bash
pip install pypitester
```

## Usage

### Command Line

```bash
# Show version
pypitester --version

# Greet someone
pypitester --name "Your Name"
```

### Python API

```python
from pypitester import utils

# Greet someone
utils.greet("Your Name")

# Add two numbers
result = utils.add(1, 2)
print(result)  # 3
```
